metadata.name: Suspicious Creation with Colorcpl
metadata.comment: Once executed, colorcpl.exe will copy the arbitrary file to c:\windows\system32\spool\drivers\color\

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\colorcpl.exe')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.icm')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.gmmp')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.cdmp')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.camp'))))

output.summary: Once executed, colorcpl.exe will copy the arbitrary file to c:\windows\system32\spool\drivers\color\
